mapper.select: select CODE_ID as codeId , CODE , CODE_NM as codeNm , CODE_DC as codeDc from COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE WHERE 1 = 1 and USE_AT = 'Y' and CODE_ID = #{codeId} order by CODE_DC
